name: 2-piece Cotton Set
description: Play-friendly set with a T-shirt and coordinated cargo shorts. Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a printed motif and ribbed neck. Cargo shorts in cotton canvas.

name: Sweatshirt
description: Soft, relaxed-fit sweatshirt with a printed design. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at neck, cuffs, and hem.

name: Superstretch Slim Fit Jeans
description: Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for added freedom of movement. Adjustable, elasticized waistband, mock fly with button, front pockets, and back pockets.

name: Printed Joggers
description: Relaxed-fit sweatpant joggers with a printed design and soft, brushed inside. Elasticized drawstring waistband and ribbing at hems.

name: Cotton Shirt
description: Long-sleeved shirt in airy, woven cotton fabric. Turn-down collar, buttons at front and at cuffs, and yoke at back. Rounded hem.

name: Relaxed Fit Joggers
description: Relaxed-fit joggers in washed cotton twill. Drawstring and covered elastic at waistband, mock fly, and tapered legs with covered elastic at hems.

name: Printed Hooded Jackett
description: Loose-fit sweatshirt jacket with a printed motif at front and soft, brushed inside. Lined hood, zipper at front with anti-chafe chin guard, and kangaroo pockets.

name: Cotton Flannel Shirt
description: Shirt in soft cotton flannel. Collar, buttons at front, and yoke at back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with sleeve placket and button at cuffs, and a rounded hem.

name: Water-repellent Puffer Vest
description: Water-repellent puffer vest in quilted, woven fabric with a detachable hood. Stand-up collar, zipper at front with anti-chafe chin guard, and welt front pockets.

name: Twill Joggers
description: Slim-fit joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill. Elasticized drawstring waistband, diagonal patch front pockets, and covered elastic at hems.
